title: 大家看看我这个指令有什么问题吗
author: ♂呆呆君♂
txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Profession:1,
CustomName:"售货员",CustomNameVisible:1,
Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:25}],

}        
        {maxUses:100,
buy:{id:388,Count:5,Damage:0},
sell:{id:355,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:S,},
打进命令方块生成不出来

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 请将指令改为/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:1,CustomName:售货员,CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:25}],Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:100,buy:{id:388,Count:5,Damage:0},sell:{id:355,Count:1,Damage:0}}]}}复制代码LZ没加Offers  还有其实LZ像绿宝石换床这种交易Damage加不加都一样= =
